participant_1.background:
I've been working at my current job for three years, and I'm really happy here.
I lost my job as a nurse after I was diagnosed with cancer.
I am an artist from a small town in the midwest.
my favorite car is the ford mustang.
i have been cheated on by every ex girlfriend except for one.

participant_2.background:
I live in a house where I'm not allowed to bring my bladed weapons into the kitchen.
i am good at throwing parties.
I have a home in the country where I can bake and cook to my heart's content.
i love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs.
i am a graphic designer.

content.text: How do you feel about being a graphic designer?
I love it! I have a lot of freedom to be creative and come up with cool designs.
That sounds really fun! I'm an artist too, but I'm not very good at graphic design.
Oh, I'm sure you're better than you think! What kind of art do you do?
I mostly do painting and drawing. I like to do landscapes and portraits.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to draw.
It's not too hard to learn! There are a lot of good tutorials online.
Maybe I'll check some out. I'm always looking for new hobbies.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I'm excited to try it.
You're welcome! What kind of graphic design do you do?
I mostly do logos and branding for businesses. I also do some web design.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you're really good at it.
Well, it sounds like you're really happy with your job. That's great!
I am! I'm really lucky to have found a job that I love.
That's wonderful! I'm glad to hear that.
